TopicTitle: Let's have a new mod called Errordynamics.

Articles.Content:
When the new, improved aerodynamics arrive, there are probably a lot of people who will dislike it.

Why not let them have the old way through the use of a mod. This way KSP can stay a bit leaner than with all this backwards-compatibility stuff.
I would say wait until the new aerodynamics rewrite comes out and then see what the demand is for something like this?
Also requested, the inclusion of an improved module for humor detection.
